template.name: pluginheaders
template.value:
/* * Plugin Name: $NAME$ * Plugin URI: $URL$ * Description: $DESC$ * Version: 1.0 * Author: Micah Wood * Author URI: https://wpscholar.com * License: GPL2 * License URI: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html * Text Domain: $TEXTDOMAIN$ * Domain Path: /languages */
$END$

template.name: register_post_type
template.value: register_post_type( '$POST_TYPE$', array( 'label' => esc_html__( '$PLURAL$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'labels' => array( 'name' => esc_html_x( '$PLURAL$', 'post type general name', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'singular_name' => esc_html_x( '$SINGULAR$', 'post type singular name', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'add_new' => esc_html_x( 'Add New', '$LC_SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'add_new_item' => esc_html__( 'Add New $SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'edit_item' => esc_html__( 'Edit $SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'new_item' => esc_html__( 'New $SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'view_item' => esc_html__( 'View $SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'view_items' => esc_html__( 'View $PLURAL$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'search_items' => esc_html__( 'Search $PLURAL$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'not_found' => esc_html__( 'No $LC_PLURAL$ found.', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'not_found_in_trash' => esc_html__( 'No $LC_PLURAL$ found in Trash.', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'parent_item_colon' => esc_html__( 'Parent $SINGULAR$:', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), // Hierarchical only 'all_items' => esc_html__( 'All $PLURAL$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'archives' => esc_html__( '$SINGULAR$ Archives', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'attributes' => esc_html__( '$SINGULAR$ Attributes', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), // Post type must support 'page-attributes' 'insert_into_item' => esc_html__( 'Insert into $LC_SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'upload_to_this_item' => esc_html__( 'Uploaded to this $LC_SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'featured_image' => esc_html__( 'Featured Image', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'set_featured_image' => esc_html__( 'Set featured image', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'remove_featured_image' => esc_html__( 'Remove featured image', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'use_featured_image' => esc_html__( 'Use featured image', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'menu_name' => esc_html_x( '$PLURAL$', 'admin menu', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), // Default is value of 'name' 'filter_items_list' => esc_html__( 'Filter $LC_PLURAL$ list', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'items_list_navigation' => esc_html__( '$PLURAL$ list navigation', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'items_list' => esc_html__( '$PLURAL$ list', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'name_admin_bar' => esc_html_x( '$SINGULAR$', 'add new on admin bar', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), // Defaults to `singular_name` ), 'description' => esc_html__( '$DESCRIPTION$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'public' => true, 'hierarchical' => false, 'has_archive' => true, 'exclude_from_search' => false, // Default is opposite of 'public' 'publicly_queryable' => true, // Default is value of 'public' 'show_ui' => true, // Default is value of 'public' 'show_in_nav_menus' => true, // Default is value of 'public' 'show_in_menu' => true, // Default is value of 'show_ui' 'show_in_admin_bar' => true, // Default is value of 'show_in_menu' 'menu_position' => null, // Integer (optional) 'menu_icon' => 'dashicons-admin-post', 'can_export' => true, // Default is true 'delete_with_user' => false, 'show_in_rest' => false, 'rest_base' => '$LC_PLURAL$', 'rewrite' => array( 'slug' => '$LC_PLURAL$', 'with_front' => false, ), 'supports' => array( 'title', 'editor', 'author', 'thumbnail', 'excerpt', 'trackbacks', 'custom-fields', 'comments', 'revisions', 'page-attributes', 'post-formats', ), 'taxonomies' => array(), // Optional ) );

template.name: register_taxonomy
template.value: register_taxonomy( '$TAXONOMY$', array(), array( 'labels' => array( 'name' => esc_html_x( '$PLURAL$', 'taxonomy general name', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'singular_name' => esc_html_x( '$SINGULAR$', 'taxonomy singular name', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'menu_name' => esc_html_x( '$PLURAL$', 'admin menu', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'all_items' => esc_html__( 'All $PLURAL$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'edit_item' => esc_html__( 'Edit $SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'view_item' => esc_html__( 'View $SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'update_item' => esc_html__( 'Update $SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'add_new_item' => esc_html__( 'Add New $SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'new_item_name' => esc_html__( 'New $SINGULAR$ Name', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'not_found' => esc_html__( 'Not Found', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'no_terms' => esc_html__( 'No $LC_PLURAL$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'items_list_navigation' => esc_html__( '$PLURAL$ list navigation', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'items_list' => esc_html__( '$PLURAL$ list', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'back_to_items' => esc_html__( '$PLURAL$ list navigation', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'parent_item' => esc_html__( 'Parent $SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), // Hierarchical only 'parent_item_colon' => esc_html__( 'Parent $SINGULAR$:', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), // Hierarchical only 'most_used' => esc_html__( 'Most Used', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), // Non-hierarchical only 'popular_items' => esc_html__( 'Popular $PLURAL$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), // Non-hierarchical only 'separate_items_with_commas' => esc_html__( 'Separate $LC_PLURAL$ with commas', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), // Non-hierarchical only 'add_or_remove_items' => esc_html__( 'Add or remove $LC_PLURAL$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), // Non-hierarchical only 'choose_from_most_used' => esc_html__( 'Choose from the most used', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), // Non-hierarchical only 'search_items' => esc_html__( 'Search $PLURAL$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), ), 'description' => esc_html__( '$DESCRIPTION$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'public' => true, 'publicly_queryable' => true, // Defaults to 'public' 'hierarchical' => false, 'show_ui' => true, // Defaults to 'public' 'show_in_nav_menus' => true, // Defaults to 'public' 'show_in_rest' => false, 'rest_base' => '$LC_PLURAL$', 'show_tagcloud' => true, // Defaults to 'show_ui' 'show_in_quick_edit' => true, // Defaults to 'show_ui' 'show_admin_column' => true, 'rewrite' => array( 'slug' => '$LC_PLURAL$', 'with_front' => false, ), ) );
